labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.system_settings: Windows 10 Pro, Version 1709, Build 16.299.309, Firefox Developer Edition Build 60.0b4 (64-bit), Firefox Stable Build 59.01 (64-bit)
data.actual_result: It will bounce back where it was, and will not highlight the spot you want it to drop into when you are dragging it
data.expected_result: The guild should place itself in the position that you dragged it into
data.short_description: Unable to move guild into different position on guilds list in Firefox browser
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord in Firefox (Dev or stable) - Try to drag one of your guilds into a different position
